metadata.name: SANDS OF TIME
metadata.created_by: Art by Arte Indigo & Poem by William P. O'Malley IV
metadata.description:
Perpendicular to a parallel universe  
Stepping across the stars  
Immersed in visions 
the colors 
of life, The spectrum 
of it all.  
Will we rise to the occasion 
My friends?  
Or  
Like so many times before  
Simply watch  
Through the glass  
As the sands of us  
Seep slowly  
Into oblivion 
The unknown known  
As it were  
To see the future  
One only needs to look  
In the past.

----------------------------------------------  
Poem written by William P. O'Malley IV 
Digital art by  Arte Indigo
